data.title: Riddley Walker : a Novel — West Vancouver Memorial Library
data.meta_description: Riddley Walker : a Novel — Hoban, Russell — This acclaimed story is set in an England that has suffered a nuclear holocaust. Society has regressed to an Iron Age, semi-literate state represented by the special language that the author created especially for this book.
data.text:
This acclaimed story is set in an England that has suffered a nuclear holocaust. Society has regressed to an Iron Age, semi-literate state represented by the special language that the author created especially for this book.

Community comments are the opinions of contributing users. These comments do not represent the opinions of West Vancouver Memorial Library.

There are no comments from the community on this title
